title: body
comment: Used in Scripture in both a physical and metaphorical sense, the body is susceptible to sin and suffering, but may be offered to God in worship and will finally be transformed by resurrection.

cschildren.title: The body is formed by God

children.title: The beauty and strength of the body

cschildren.title: Certain actions and attitudes affect the health of the body

children.title: Godliness is no guarantee of bodily health

primaryrefs.comment: Suffering and death are the result of sin in general, but specific experiences of suffering cannot usually be traced to specific sin.

cschildren.title: Life here and now in the body
The believer's body as a temple of the Holy Spirit

seealsos.comment: Jesus Christ also likens his body to a temple

cschildren.title: Believers are to devote their bodies to God
Sin at work in the body

children.title: The body is subject to sinful desires
Bodily temptation is to be resisted
Undue concern for the body is to be avoided
Dead bodies restored to this life
